oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Inscribed Bible of Pvt. Ferdinand Berry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Inscription notes that the Bible was given to Pvt. Ferdinand Berry by his mother (Mary Margaret Tannehill Berry). The soldier wrote inside the front cover that in the event of his death, the Bible was to be returned to her. Berry was a member of Co. B, 1st (Feild's) Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. He was born in 1841 in Nashville, and died in 1862 in Knoxville. Family historian thinks he died of pneumonia on his way to Shiloh.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
